Entities.Name: Alcohol
Entities.Definition: Refers to alcohol-related information in a patient's social history.

Sample Data.drinking: Reports drinking 2 beers daily for several years until lay off.

Entities.Name: Drug
Entities.Definition: Refers to drug-related information, including both illicit and prescription drug use.

Sample Data.marijuana | cocaine: current marijuana use, cocaine quit 5 years ago.

Entities.Name: Tobacco
Entities.Definition: Information related to tobacco use, including smoking status and frequency.

Sample Data.smoking: Smoking down to 2-3 cig per day.

Sample Data.finance at Mass Eye & Ear: Works in finance at Mass Eye & Ear.

Entities.Name: Living Status
Entities.Definition: Details about the patient's living conditions.

Sample Data.a rehab facility: Currently at a rehab facility, but previously living with his wife at home.

Dataset.Name: N2C2 Shared Task Data
Dataset.Details: Dataset consists of clinical notes from MIMIC-III and University of Washington Harborview Medical Centers, annotated for social determinants of health.

Annotation Guidelines.Description: The annotations involve detailed categorization of social determinants of health from clinical notes, using a novel marker-based neural network model for effective extraction.
